snippet: In the final week of the regular season of Major League Baseball, 15 three-game series remain and only five have no bearing on the postseason.
abstract: Tyler Kepner On Baseball column examines final week of the regular MLB season; notes only 5 of the 15 three-game series that remain have no possible bearing on the postseason.
lead_paragraph: In the final week of the regular season of Major League Baseball, 15 three-game series remain and only five have no bearing on the postseason.

headline.seo: Final Week of Baseball Could Bring Spoilers, Miracles and Firsts
headline.main: A Good Week to Be a Fan, and to Have Multiple TVs
headline.print_headline: A Good Week to Be a Fan, and to Have Multiple TVs
